mutants.original_line: word_count = {word: count for word, count in word_count.items() if word not in stop_words}
mutants.mutated_line: word_count = {word: count for (word, count) in word_count.items() if word in stop_words}

mutants.original_line: top_k = sorted(word_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)[:k]
mutants.mutated_line: top_k = sorted(word_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=False)[:k]

mutants.original_line: top_k = sorted(word_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)[:k]
mutants.mutated_line: top_k = sorted(word_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[2], reverse=True)[:k]

mutants.original_line: top_k = sorted(word_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)[:k]
mutants.mutated_line: top_k = sorted(word_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[0], reverse=True)[:k]

mutants.original_line: top_k = sorted(word_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)[:k]
mutants.mutated_line: top_k = sorted(word_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[0], reverse=True)[:k]

mutants.mutated_line: top_k = sorted(word_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[-1], reverse=True)[:k]
